types.html:
tour de table m (plural tours de table)

  1. introduction, presentation of every participant of a reunion
  2. act of eliciting/collecting the opinion of all the participants
    faire un tour de table ― to go round the table, to seek the views of all those present, to check whether anyone has anything to add

See also

[edit]
  • tour d'horizon
  • table ronde
trans: introduction, presentation of every participant of a reunion
act of eliciting/collecting the opinion of all the participants

title: tour de table
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /tuʁ də tabl/
